intro: This level combines core Java concepts to build mini console-based projects.
points: Use classes, objects, methods, and arrays in a single program.
Create simple menu-driven applications like a student manager or library system.
Practice handling basic input validation and edge cases.
Focus on writing clean code with good naming and structure.
Prepare your Java fundamentals for future DSA and interviews.
